explains: n. 绝望，无望；不抱希望

sentences.cn: 绝望是一种致命的疾病。

sentences.en: He sank into the depths of hopelessness after his business failed.
sentences.cn: 商店倒闭使他陷入了极度的绝望之中。

sentences.en: Potter lifted his face and looked around him with a pathetic hopelessness in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 波特抬起头，可怜又绝望地看了看了四周。
